note: Molly Gloss is the author of several novels including The Jump-Off Creek (PEN Faulkner finalist), The Dazzle of Day (PEN West Fiction Prize), and The Hearts of Horses (national bestseller) as well as a retrospective story collection Unforeseen. She writes both realistic fiction and science fiction, and her work in both genres often concerns the landscape, literature, mythology and life of the American West.
